content: @James Agnew on our project, we are trying to use custom SearchParameters in a DSTU2 HAPI server. We are following this blog post: https://blog.smilecdr.com/2017/02/08/custom-search-parameters-in-hapi-fhir/. https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/hapi-fhir/b5oC2Zsh-sw does say that it will be implemented in DSTU2, but we are having trouble getting it working. I just wanted to confirm if this feature does exist in the DSTU2 stream and what version.
nm, I was able to test it on the public DSTU2 HAPI server and realized that the error was mine. We have this working now. Nothing to see here.
